title: WON MY SERIES BUT DID NOT RANK UP

replies.body: It's strange to hear that you didn't rank up after winning a series, so I took a look to see what the deal is.  It doesn't look like you've had a series since the 6th of this month.  That series ended after 2 losses, and I wasn't able to find any series after that.  Per the[ ranked play](https://www.google.com/search?q=ranked+play+guide&rlz=1C1NHXL_enUS727US727&oq=ranked+play+guide&aqs=chrome..69i57.1614j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8) guide, you need to reach 100 LP to enter a series which hasn't happened just yet.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I was in my series. It said congrats you've made it to your series and have one free win, etc. that was the game where I went 2/2/5 as vi. then I played another game as kha zix and lost. But right after that kha zix game I played another game as vi and won, going 14/0/2 which would've meant that i.d rank up. instead of ranking up it put me back at 98lp. No offense to you but I know for a fact I was in my series with one free win, a loss, then a win.

Aye, it looks like I was looking at the wrong ranked queue.  Thanks for clearing that up with additional details!  It looks like you did enter a series in ranked solo earlier.  Unfortunately, there was a queue dodge that resulted in a second loss and ended the series.  Any [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) during a series will result in a loss and cancel any promo helpers, so it's important to stay in-game.  Hopefully that clears it up now, and good luck in your next series!

Thank you, and one more thing relating to that dodge (I had completely forgotten that it happened and do not recall it saying that I lost my series), with the new league setup just about everything about league lags really bad except for my in-game and it leads to me not being able to place in champ picks, accept games, ban, set my masteries/runes. I try to never dodge or afk but I cant do anything about it with the lag. Its never happened until the new setup.

The updated client is still in testing so you could run into issue.  While testing is on-going, there's no harm in using the legacy client to queue up for your ranked games:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Good luck!
Thank you very much for the help
